title: Orca Whirlpool State
description: Decoded Orca Whirlpool concentrated liquidity pool state

pool_address.description: Solana pubkey of the Orca Whirlpool

mint_x.description: Mint address of token X (usually SOL)

mint_y.description: Mint address of token Y (the token being traded)

sqrt_price_x64.description: Square root of price as Q64.64 integer (price = (sqrt_price/2^64)^2)

tick_current.description: Current tick position in the pool

liquidity.description: Current liquidity in the active tick (Q64.64)

tick_spacing.description: Tick spacing for the pool (e.g., 64 for standard pools)
